notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: (1) Research project: A. Conception (SBC, SSA, MN, CD, AS), B. Organization (SBC, SSA, MN), C. Execution (SBC, SSA, JK, MM, MN). Data generation: A. Experimental (RG, JD, CB, MN). (3) Statistical Analysis: A. Design (SBC, SSA, MN, FF), B. Execution (SBC, SSA, MM, MN, FF, JJ). (4) Manuscript Preparation: A. Writing of the first draft (SBC), B. Review and Critique (all authors).
